children.text: In interviews, Lester Hamlet consistently emphasizes the profound importance and impact his father had on his life. During a 2015 interview with Amaury Pérez, Lester explains how his father played a pivotal role in shaping both his trauma and the world he would enter, starting with the decision to name him Hamlet. Ten years later, in an interview with Jack Riordan, Lester introduces his father again, confessing that his father’s emigration introduced trauma into his reality—specifically, the pain of being left behind.

En entrevistas, Lester Hamlet enfatiza constantemente la profunda importancia e impacto que su padre tuvo en su vida. Durante una entrevista en 2015 con Amaury Pérez, Lester explica cómo su padre desempeñó un papel crucial en la formación tanto de su trauma como del mundo en el que entraría, comenzando con la decisión de nombrarlo Hamlet. Diez años después, en una entrevista con Jack Riordan, Lester presenta nuevamente a su padre, confesando que la emigración de su padre introdujo el trauma en su realidad, específicamente el dolor de ser dejado atrás.

title: Lester's Relationship with his Father (Trauma + Exile)
